title: MVB
description:
Enhances your survival multiplayers experiences with only one plugin

MVB aims to create a Vanilla+ experience with fully customisable features
No need to install a bunch of plugins that need 10 library eachs

title: Babarcode
description:
Babarcode is an external program for Minecraft that allows you to play Minecraft using... a ✨barcode scanner✨.
It works by scanning barcodes that the reader will input as if it were a keyboard. The barcode is a number (like 01). The program will then read the code and perform the associated action.

title: Participation sur OpenMC
description:
OpenMC is a collaborative Minecraft plugin available on GitHub
I participated in it (and became a collaborator)

Playable on play.openmc.fr
